Title: OneStop - Decompression Software
Description: OneStop Deco is a scuba diving program that calculates dive time and decompression obligations. Technology being used is .Net 3.5 & WPF.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

OneStop is a decompression planning application for open and closed circuit diving. The application is based on the Buhlmann ZHL16B algorithm with m-value gradient conservatism. OneStop supports the use of air, nitrox and trimix gases.

The application is built using Silverlight 3. A beta version is currently avilable at http://damiensiviero.com/onestopdeco/beta/

Credit must be given to Guy Wittig who developed MV-Plan, upon which the the algorithm code is based.

NOTE: No further development is expect on the previous WPF version, although the source code is still available.
